entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Carcross
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:32 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Occasional drifting snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
